page.title: 13Methodist Chapel Tebay
page.content: Tebay Chapel was built in 1885 as there was nowhere in the area for Methodists to worship.The land was bought from James Wharton & built by George Atkinson & a committee.This year the centenary is celebrated & plans include a flower festival,an organ recital & a concert by Kirkby Stephen Silver Band. There will be 5 past ministers visiting.Nine other other organisations use the premises:- {Play Group,Guides,Doctors Surgery, {Clinic, Parish Council Meetings, Day {Care,Sunday School,Youth Club(started {in July 1985) & Junior Club.}It is also used as the Polling Station for elections.Services are held every Sunday.
